# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This special offer is designed to give you the opportunity to see how this product can enhance your life or work, without any obligation. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience! Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
